page.title: 05A Typical School Day
page.content: My name is{Jenny.}Each school day I get up at 7 o'clock, get washed and dressed and have my breakfast. Then I clean my teeth and get all my things ready for school. At 8.30 a.m we leave for the{school bus.}When we get to school we sometimes get a short playtime, and the game we play at the moment is{marbles.}At 9 o'clock we come in for{register and assembly.} After that we have the usual work, {English, Maths or Project.}At 10.30 a.m. we have a break for 15 minutes - marbles again! Then another session of lessons until midday. It is now dinner time and for todays dinner we had{beefburgers, potatoes {and beans,}and for pudding{peach flan} which was nice. At 1 o'clock we work at{Art, P.E. or Music}until 3.30 p.m. with a short playtime at 2.15 p.m. Then we go home on the bus for tea.
